data.title: B Site to B Green Dark Cover
data.description: This is a good one way smoke to defend B Site from B Green. This will allow you to prevent a push and also allow you to get a pick on anyone lurking up past your smoke.

data.title: B Oranges to B Tube Dark Cover
data.description: This is a good one way smoke to get an advantageous angle on your enemy as they are pouring through under B Tube.

data.title: A Site to A Pipes Dark Cover
data.description: This is a good one way smoke to prevent an A Site push and also to get a quick kill on someone approaching your smoke.

data.title: A Rafter to A Pipes Dark Cover
data.description: This is a good one way smoke to prevent the attackers from executing on A Site and also allowing you to get a pick on someone slow peaking from A pipes.

data.title: B Orange to Mid Blue Paranoia
data.description: This is a good paranoia to get a quick pick or valuable information from middle.

data.title: A Site to A Pipes Paranoia
data.description: This is a good paranoia to blind your opponent and take an aggressive peak on them or to stop an immediate rush.
